p: Tumor assessments were carried out on all target lesions identified at baseline by PET and CT scans after R‐High‐CHOP/CHASER and after LEED therapy completion (day 50‐63 after ASCT). In patients in CR after LEED therapy, tumor assessment was done every 6 months for 2 years and, thereafter, every year for the next 3 years. Tumor response was determined by the Revised Response Criteria for Malignant Lymphoma 2007. 19 Toxicities were evaluated according to the NCI Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events version 3.0.
